title: 指令求助~
author: BIGWHITE_
txt_content: 如何检测玩家计分板分数是否等于AS计分板分数 AS分数是变化的假设计分板为a AS名字为b

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
BIGWHITE_ 发表于 2019-6-6 16:52
如果是1.12.X呢？
scoreboard players operation @s a -= @e[c=1,name=b] a
execute @s[score_a_min=0,score_a=0] ~ ~ ~ say 相等

不过这样会改玩家本身 a 的分数。如果不想改，可以再建一个新的记分板 c，然后
scoreboard players operation @s c = @s a
scoreboard players operation @s c -= @e[c=1,name=b] a
execute @s[score_c_min=0,score_c=0] ~ ~ ~ say 相等

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPGoding 于 2019-6-6 16:54 编辑 

execute if score @s a = @e[limit=1,name=b] a run say 相等

replies.author: BIGWHITE_
replies.txt_content:
SPGoding 发表于 2019-6-6 16:50
execute if score @s a = @e[limit=1,name=b] a run sau 相等
如果是1.12.X呢？
